New Records: Madushanka-Theekshana partnership, one for the record books
Key Match Events: Ravindra looks to slog sweep this over the in-field on leg-side but doesn't get the elevation and ends up handing a catch at mid-on.

Mitchell ends up chipping this high in the air as Mathews takes the pace off the ball. The ball balloons in the deep behind point and a stunning effort diving forward by Asalanka to complete this catch.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand will need to win this to cement its place in the semifinals. It could still be eliminated though if Pakistan beats England comprehensively, going past New Zealand’s Net Run Rate.
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand has one foot in the semis!
ICC World Cup 2023 Points Table after NZ vs SL: New Zealand in driver’s seat for semis spot after thumping win over Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side
Expect another run-fest at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium today
